quote: Video tells the story of the home, unlike a photograph, and engages the buyer emotionally.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of video in modern real estate marketing.
suggested_hook: Are you still relying on photos to sell homes? Here's why video is the future.

quote: Tell me the truth and tell me the number that it is, even if you think I don't want to hear it.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the importance of honesty in client relationships.
suggested_hook: Why honesty is the best policy in real estate.
